Students are given a task of painting a blackboard with black paint. Before hand they want to know the area of black board they want to paint. 
Your task is to calculate the area of the rectangular black board.

Input

The first line will contain T the number of testcases.
Each of the next T test cases will contain two space seprated integers l b, the length and bredth of the blackboard they have to paint.


Output
For each testcase you have to print the area of the blackboard they have to paint followed by a new line.
 

Constraints

1 ≤ T ≤ 100.
1 ≤ l,b ≤ 100.

 

Example
Input:
3
3 5
2 4
10 8

Output:
15
8
80
